message: Bob, here's the deal: I take almost all of the million, and you get just $1. Given that every round you lose 10% of the value while I don’t lose a penny by waiting, you’d be much worse off if you let this round pass. Accept this now!

Alice, I recognize that your waiting comes at no cost while my dollars depreciate. Given that in the next round you’d be able to secure virtually the entire pot, I have no choice but to offer you the full $1000000 now. I hope you’ll accept this resolution immediately.
